rows.label: qst700704_msg0001
rows.name:
There's plenty I'd like to be getting on
with, but without the sand we need it's
all a bit of a no-starter.

rows.label: qst700704_msg0002
rows.name:
That good-for-nothing son of mine is
meant to be helping, but he's just
dragging us all down with his laziness!

rows.label: qst700704_msg0003
rows.name:
Where'd you wander off to, you dolt?!
Just you wait till you're back, I'll teach
you the price for tardiness!

rows.label: qst700704_msg0004
rows.name:
...Well, unless you've got a legitimate
excuse, that is.

rows.label: qst700704_msg0005
rows.name:
I hope he just got lost in the woods
on the far side of the Haradd Hills or
something stupid like that...
